title: Michelle Obama copied her speech from Saul Alinski in 2008.
subtitle: After Melania Trump was accused of stealing Michelle Obama ' s 2008 speech to the Republican National Congress Party in 2016, several sites claimed that the Front itself had stolen Saul Alinsky.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Michelle Obama stole Saul Alinski in her 2008 National Democratic Conference speech.
